movie.title: Chasing Mavericks
movie.plot: Surfer Jay Moriarity sets out to ride the Northern California break known as Mavericks.

events.title: Jay Moriarty is given a radio on his 16th birthday
Jay Moriarty wipes out at Mavericks, and a picture of his wipeout appears on the cover of Surfer magazine
